name: Playbook for Mitigating Unauthorized RDP Access Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an unauthorized user exploited a misconfigured RDP service to gain access and move laterally within a company's network.

parallel--3bc84a1f-81af-4bd6-8c81-19a8bb.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--3bc84a1f-81af-4bd6-8c81-19a8bb.description: Execute necessary mitigation actions for the unauthorized RDP access.

action--f6c665bd-7001-4a12-8324-8ab73f90.name: Restrict RDP access to trusted IP addresses
action--f6c665bd-7001-4a12-8324-8ab73f90.description: Add a firewall rule to limit RDP access to only trusted IPs.

commands.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name='RDP Restriction' dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=3389 remoteip=<trusted_ip>

action--b2a3373d-d5d6-4b84-9c1b-5d2eaf2f.name: Kill the unauthorized RDP session
action--b2a3373d-d5d6-4b84-9c1b-5d2eaf2f.description: Log off all active RDP sessions to terminate unauthorized access.

commands.command: query session | findstr /C:Active | for /F 'tokens=3' %i in ('more') do logoff %i

action--3e4d25e2-dcd3-454f-af13-6b68c1d4.name: Run a security audit on RDP configuration
action--3e4d25e2-dcd3-454f-af13-6b68c1d4.description: Ensure all security settings for RDP are properly configured.

action--d2fe4b0a-9daf-48cd-942d-7f2d6ce0.name: Handle Disabled RDP
action--d2fe4b0a-9daf-48cd-942d-7f2d6ce0.description: RDP is not enabled, perform alternative security measures.

commands.command: echo 'RDP is disabled, implement alternative security measures.'
